customer_reviews.title: I really did like the smell and gentle cleansing properties of this body ...
customer_reviews.text: I really did like the smell and gentle cleansing properties of this body wash; however, be advised some may experience an allergic reaction to the tea tree oil. I was using this body wash in conjunction with a deodorant that also contained tea tree oil. I developed a bad rash on both underarms and it was very unpleasant. I visited a dermatologist that identified the tea tree as the culprit and told me it is not uncommon for people to come in with allergic reactions to ingredients that are more natural (e.g., tea tree oil, lavender, eucalyptus). As soon as I stopped using it, my skin was okay. Not everyone will react this way, it'll be case by case.

product_meta.title: DERMA E Face and Body Wash with Tea Tree and Vitamin E, 8 Fl oz
product_meta.description: This natural antibacterial cleanser thoroughly deep cleans the entire face and body leaving skin feeling clean, soft, deodorized and healthy. A unique combination of ingredients provides natural antiseptic action to combat a wide range of problem skin conditions such as blemishes, rashes, irritation, flaking and itching. Tea Tree Oil with its natural antibacterial, anti-fungal and solvent properties deep cleans, removing toxins and debris. Research shows Tea Tree is effective at clearing blemishes and resolving fungal issues. Antioxidant Vitamin E and herbal extracts revitalize and moisturize skin. Consistent use helps prevent future problem skin conditions. Perfect as a hand wash in the kitchen, at work or as a shower gel. After the gym, playing sports or any outdoor activity, this antibacterial cleanser helps prevent body odor, and fungal and bacterial skin issues. 100% vegan, cruelty-free, paraben-free, mineral oil-free, lanolin-free, gluten-free, GMO-free.
